item.title: Vim Personal Minimal Setup
item.description: Use Vim without your own .vimrc is not an easy task. Trainning to a certification test I was forced to use an virtual machine without my customizations. So, I had to find an minimal setup that would make the default Vim usable for me.

item.title: Vim Key Bindings
item.description: Vim Command Language and examples of how to get things done. Verbs # v : visual c : change d : delete y : yank/copy Modifiers # i : inside a : around t : till.
